messages.message:
Facebook User
ey kiddies, i need to know who's coming, who needs a room/roommate and ride, who's planning on driving, yadda yadda. please get back to me by thursday 1/19 or you're on your own and i won't worry about ya! ha. i'm staying at the las vegas marriott on convention center drive and i've got a friend getting us the friend & family discount, awww yeah. $59/night. 
i'm excited to see you there! yay! 
~m
